headline: Meet the Beaten-Down Biotech Stock Cathie Wood Loves and Wall Street Says May Soar More than 65%
summary: Ark Invest chief Cathie Wood is known for scooping up shares of innovators early in their growth stories and holding on for the long term.  This takes time, but patient investors could score a major win by following Wood's strategy -- and by picking up a couple of her favorite stocks.  Over the past several weeks, Wood has added to one of her key positions, a stock that's lost about 20% this year.
